description: Retrieves information about Amazon Macie membership invitations that were received by an account.

nested_items.name: invitations
nested_items.description: An array of objects, one for each invitation that was received by the account.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID for the account that sent the invitation.

nested_items.name: invitationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the invitation.

nested_items.name: invitedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and extended ISO 8601 format, when the invitation was sent.

nested_items.name: relationshipStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the relationship between the account that sent the invitation and the account that received the invitation.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response. This value is null if there are no additional pages.
